titleStmt.title: Joy in the Lord opened in a sermon preached at Pauls, May 6. / By Edward Reynolds, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Newcomb, for Robert Bostock, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Kings-Head in St Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Kings-Head in St Pauls Church-yard
